          <title>
            <string language="en">Difference between an ionic and a molecular substance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschied zwischen einer Ionen- und molekularen 
Substanz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différence entre une substance ionique et 
moléculaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diferença entre uma substância ionic e 
molecular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Differenza fra una sostanza ionica e molecolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορά μεταξύ μιας ιοντικής και μοριακής ουσίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diferencia entre una sustancia iónica y 
molecular</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares the reaction of an ionic substance with a molecular substance when tested for electrical conduction under a closed circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht die Reaktion einer 
Ionensubstanz mit einer molekularen Substanz, wenn es auf elektrische 
Übertragung unter einem geschlossenen Stromkreis geprüft wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare la réaction d'une substance 
ionique à une substance moléculaire une fois déterminé la 
conduction électrique sous un circuit fermé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara a reação de uma 
substância ionic com uma substância molecular quando testado para a 
condução elétrica sob um circuito fechado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema paragona la reazione di una sostanza
ionica ad una sostanza molecolare una volta esaminato a conduzione 
elettrica sotto un circuito chiuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει την αντίδραση μιας 
ιοντικής ουσίας με μια μοριακή ουσία όταν εξετάζεται για την 
ηλεκτρική διεξαγωγή κάτω από ένα κλειστό κύκλωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara la reacción de una 
sustancia iónica con una sustancia molecular cuando está probado 
para la conducción eléctrica bajo circuito cerrado.</string>
          </description>
